project.description: 文件服务快速使用，可自动从配置中心获取文件服务器信息，业务使用接口即可快速上传文件，适配多种云端服务器以及本地方式 File service use quickly, and the file server information can be automatically obtained from the configuration center. The business interface can quickly upload files, adapt to a variety of cloud servers and local methods
